response:
"datenschutz ist menschenrecht! warum geben wir unsere persönlichen daten so leichtfertig an fremde aus? # datenschutz # privatsphäre" 

translation: 
"data protection is a human right! why do we give our personal data away so carelessly to strangers? #dataprivacy #privacy"

this response reflects the concern and skepticism that many germans have regarding data privacy, given their country's history with surveillance and censorship. the use of hashtags like #datenschutz (data protection) and #privatsphäre (privacy) is common on twitter, allowing users to categorize and connect with others discussing similar topics.
